titleStmt.title: For G.P. or the author of a little book entituled, Just measures, in an epistle, &c. and to all approvers thereof; with a postscript and a few words to the yearly meeting in London.
titleStmt.author: Raunce, John, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author the 10th day of the 3d month, in the year,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).

person.persName: the author the 10th day of the 3d month
